altTitles.ja: SERVAMP-サーヴァンプ-

altTitles.th: เซอร์แวมพ์

description.en: When a stray black cat crosses Shirota Mahiru’s path, the high school freshman’s life will never be the same again, because "Kuro" is no ordinary feline, but a Servamp, or servant vampire. While Mahiru’s personal philosophy is one of non-intervention, he soon becomes embroiled in an ancient, altogether surreal conflict between vampires and humans.
description.ja: 高校１年生・城田真昼が道ばたで拾った一匹の可愛い黒猫・クロの正体は、「サーヴァンプ」という下僕の吸血鬼。しかも性格は超ひきこもりニート系。契約によってクロの主人となった真昼は、吸血鬼同士の争いに巻き込まれ戦うはめになるのだが……？

description.en:
She grew up an orphan, working herself to death in part-time jobs, and eventually died from exhaustion. 

Right before her death, she was reading an R-rated romance fantasy novel and found herself reincarnated as Annette Ethelred, the twisted villainess who was adopted into a duke's family and was bent on killing the novel's heroine. Annette was also the last princess of a fallen kingdom. Her happiness over the lavish lifestyle of the duke’s family didn’t last long, as she was quickly thrown out with nothing to her name, punished for the evil deeds of the original Annette. 

But giving up wasn’t an option. With the survival skills honed from all her part-time jobs, she managed to get hired as a maid at the temple. 

"This time around, I’ll make lots of money and date a handsome man! ...But seriously, are there no normal guys around here?!"

altTitles.ja: 第三王女の下剋上

description.en: Super sweet and super-sand sculptured female statue against the harem! I often hear: "Three princes and three princesses! Your puppets are fighting again!" The overbearing female CEO traversed to the world of female honors and woke up with seven husbands.

altTitles.ja: ちがう宮原おまえじゃない！

altTitles.zh: 我要找的、才不是宫原你啦！

altTitles.ja: ちが宮

description.en:
The manga centers on Arima, a boy who has a crush on a girl named Yukihira. But every time he tries to make a move to get closer to Yukihira, his other friend Miyahara just happens to be in the scene and will always mistakenly think that Arima is making a move on her. ([ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-11-11/midori-obiya-launches-new-manga-mini-series/.191780))
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [Young Jump!](https://ynjn.jp/title/7831)
description.ja: 憧れの女子”雪比良さん”と仲良くなるべく奮闘する有馬！ でもなぜか、いつもイイところであらわれるのは…。 末永〜く見守りたい！中学生３人の青春ラブコメ、ここに開幕っ！
description.vi: Câu chuyện diễn biến xung quanh Arima - một cậu bạn sơ trung phải lòng một bạn nữ cùng lớp tên Yukihira. Nhưng mỗi khi cậu ấy chuẩn bị tiến gần hơn với Yukihara thì cô bạn thuở nhỏ Miyahara lại bất chợt xuất hiện lúc nào chẳng hay làm cho mọi người lầm tưởng rằng Arima đang nhắm đến cô bạn đó hơn là Yukihara.
description.pt-br: Arima, é um garoto apaixonado por uma garota chamada Yukihira. Mas toda vez que ele tenta ficar mais próximo de Yukihira, sua outra amiga, Miyahara simplesmente entra em cena e sempre pensa erroneamente que Arima está fazendo seus movimentos por ela.

altTitles.th: ถนนสายนี้ ข้าจอง...

altTitles.ja: 頭文字Ｄ

description.en: Only the fearless survive in the white-hot world of street racing, as teams take on dangerous roads in the shadow of Mt. Akina. Behind the wheel of the mysterious "Ghost of Akina" is Takumi, on his way to becoming the greatest racer ever.
description.es: Sólo los intrépidos sobreviven en el candente mundo de las carreras callejeras, mientras los equipos toman caminos peligrosos a la sombra del Monte Akina. Al volante del misterioso "Fantasma de Akina" está Takumi, en camino de convertirse en el mejor corredor de la historia.
description.vi:
Fujiwara Takumi là một cậu nhóc 18 tuổi bình thường, sống cùng cha mình với quán đậu hũ. Ngày ngày Takumi đều phải đi giao đậu hũ trên đèo Akina vào mỗi sáng sớm để phụ giúp gia đình. Sẽ không có gì đáng nói nếu như bố của cậu bắt cậu phải làm điều này liên tục từ năm lớp 7. Nhưng ý đồ sau đấy của ông còn hơn cả là việc giao hàng, thứ ông quan trọng nhất chính là lúc thằng con mình lái xe về, khi chiếc 86 bắt đầu đổ dốc. Thừa hưởng dòng máu đua xe từ bố, Takumi dần dần đổ dốc nhanh hơn bất kỳ ai, đến mức nhiều người còn phong cho cậu (khi chưa biết mặt) là "bóng ma đèo Akina". Nhưng cậu vẫn không hề nhận ra khả năng của mình suốt quãng thời gian đó, cậu cũng không biết cái xe mình đang lái là chiếc Toyota 86 , thậm chí coi lái xe là vô bổ, chỉ lái xe khi phụ giúp gia đình.

Đến một hôm, sau khi có một buổi đi chơi với cậu bạn Itsuki và anh đồng nghiệp Iketani, Takumi đã được gặp gỡ đội Akina Speed Stars (trong tâm thế sợ hãi cách lái xe của anh Iketani), và đúng lúc đó, đội Akagi Red Suns xuất hiện và thể hiện đẳng cấp khác biệt hoàn toàn của họ với đội Speed Stars. Iketani và đồng đội chỉ biết ngồi tuyệt vọng và lái xe về. Đội Red Suns ở lại núi Akina một lúc đến 4h sáng và chuẩn bị rút quân. Nhưng đó cũng là lúc Takumi trên đường đi giao hàng về, Keisuke Takahashi, tay đua số 2 của Red Suns đã có một cuộc đua ngắn với chiếc 86 và đã bị chiếc xe 10 năm tuổi hạ gục một các nhục nhã. Kể từ đó anh ta tìm mọi cách để gặp lại chiếc 86 đó, danh tiếng của Red Suns cũng đang bị đe dọa, các tay đua từ khắp nơi đổ về để xem trận đấu chính thức giữa chiếc 86 và tay đua số 2 của Akagi Red Suns, thậm chí anh trai của Keisuke, cũng là tay đua số 1 của Red Suns, Ryousuke cũng phải kinh ngạc và quay lại Akina dù trước đó đã đánh giá thấp nơi đây. Từ đó, danh tiếng của chiếc 86 vang danh khắp nơi đến mức các tay đua hàng đầu ở Gunma đều đến Akina để thách đấu Takumi và chiếc 86. Liệu Takumi sẽ ứng biến như thế nào với các tay đua trình độ càng ngày càng cao?

altTitles.ja: Bの劇場

description.en:
1: Noel  
On the day before Christmas, Amberley disappears into the forest while searching for Noel's gift. He is cursed and cannot leave without aging faster than normal, but he leaves the forest anyway to deliver gifts to the girl he loves.  
  
2: The Teddy Bear Murder Case  
Four murders have taken place at an all girl school. Lying beside each of the victim was a teddy bear with one missing limb. Now It is up to Detective Hebizuka Amaru and his cute assistant Kohijiri-kun to solve the mystery!  
  
3: The Four Sisters Murder Case  
  
4: A Is For Alice  
Alastair, a grown man, is off to follow the Rabbit once again to return to Wonderland.  
  
5: The Bedroom Girl, The Sculpture Room Girl  
A story about a girl in her death bed finding another chance in life in the body of a doll. But is the girl in the bedroom the same as the girl in the sculpture room? Can the doll master make her dreams come true?  
  
6: B&W ～Black&White～  
A story about a boy waiting for his sister.  
  
7: Le Jardin Du thé  
A mysterious story about a poor young man who orders a kind of tea called Huan Ying – “The Illusion”. He asked for a small quantity - just to have a taste - and was granted one cupful…  
  
8-9: Free Fitting For Her  
A priest and his captured vampire must save a naive and selfish young girl from the murderous desires of a Lolicon. But perhaps this girl isn't all that she seems.  
  
10: Rose Dusk, Pale Moon  
11: Hello, My Sister  
12: The Happy Prince  
  
13: Welcome To Wonderland  
Simon, Alastair's old classmate, is now a grown man who bumps into his childhood Wonderland traveler.

title.en: Kid Icarus - Jibun no Kyoku ga Aru ka Tanoshimi Datta Pit-kun 4-Koma Manga (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 自分の曲があるか楽しみだったピットくん4コマ漫画

title.en: BanG Dream! - AnoSoyo Are Already Dating (Doujinshi)

description.en: There is no story to read here. (Interactive) This series contains themes regarding mental health and anxiety that may not be suitable for all readers. Viewer discretion is advised. If you or someone you know is struggling or in crisis, please reach out for help at [Crisis Text Line](http://crisistextline.org/).
description.ur:
یہاں پڑھنے کیلئے کوئی کہانی نہیں ہے۔ (متعامل) یہ تانتا ذہنی صحت اور اضطرابی سمات پر مشتمل ہے جو تمام قارئین کیلئے شاید مناسب نہ ہو۔ صوابدیدِ ناظرین کا مشورہ دیا جاتا ہے۔ اگر آپ یا کوئی جسے آپ جانتے ہیں جد و جہد کر رہا ہے یا بحران میں ہے، براہِ کرم مدد کرائسز ٹیکسٹ لائن پر رابطہ کریں:
(http://crisistextline.org/).

altTitles.ja: 夜のまにまに

altTitles.fr: À la tombée de la nuit

description.en: Cheerful, energetic high school girl Chika and shy, reserved boy Waya couldn’t be more different. But they have a secret: every Wednesday after 9PM they meet outside the convenience store where Waya works. Bit by bit, under the light of the moon, a unique connection begins to blossom in this enchanting coming-of-age love story!
description.fr:
**À la tombée de la nuit** 

La joyeuse et énergique Chika, le timide et silencieux Waya. Ces deux-là, qui sont le jour et la nuit, discutent chaque mercredi soir devant une supérette. À la tombée de la nuit, il se rapproche peu à peu. Une histoire d'amour de jeunesse !
description.pt-br: Chika é uma garota alegre e divertida, Waya é um garoto tímido e gentil. Os dois opostos se falam apenas na loja de conveniência na quarta-feira. Uma história de amor juvenil onde eles diminuem a distância lentamente durante a noite!

altTitles.ja: おさななじみの百合
ジュカイ―承認欲求の森―

description.en:
Freelance writer Shunsuke Koshiji went to the Sea of Trees at the foot of Mount Fuji in response to a video streamer's message for help. Upon arrival, he found dozens of other streamers gathered there, their goal being to find a secret cult known as "Jofuku Divine Teaching," who are said to operate in the forest. But that night, something happens...

The Sea of Trees and a dark cult... both will bring out the streamers' ugly true desire of wanting to go viral...

(Source: Nihon Bungeisha)
description.ja:
富士の樹海に潜むとされるカルト教団「徐福神霊教」。
その実態を暴くべく、樹海へと足を踏み入れた動画配信者たちだが…。
自己顕示欲に塗れた彼らを玩ぶように、
死と恐怖が、鬱蒼と茂る樹海で拡散する―。
衝撃の承認欲求サスペンス!!

altTitles.ja: 13章のブラピ

altTitles.th: เชิญร่ำสุรา

description.en: The Six Prefectures of Zhongbo were ceded away in surrender to the external enemies, and Shen Zechuan was taken into custody in the capital, reduced to a drowning dog loathed and condemned by all. Xiao Chiye followed the scent of the furor and made his way over. But instead of setting others on him, he kicked Shen Zechuan with his very own leg that rendered the latter an invalid. Who would expect this invalid to turn around and bite him in a counterattack until he was all drenched in blood? That was the start of an epic feud between both men who tear at each other every time they come face-to-face with one another.
description.pl:
Shen Zechuan jest ósmym synem zdradzieckiego księcia Jianxing, człowieka, który skazał swoje miasta i ludzi na zagładę z rąk wroga. Jako jedyny żyjący członek swojej linii, Shen Zechuan jest znienawidzony przez cały naród. A nienawiść nikogo nie płonie goręcej niż uczucie Xiao Chiye, najmłodszego syna potężnego księcia Libei.

Xiao Chiye niczego nie pragnie bardziej niż śmierci Shen Zechuana, ale ten wbrew wszelkim przeciwnościom trzyma się życia. Zamiast poddać się hańbie swojej rodziny, staje się cierniem w boku Xiao Chiye, wdzierając się do bezwzględnego świata politycznego stolicy. Jednak gdy ci dwaj zaciekli wrogowie walczą z więzami swojego losu, zostają przyciągnięci do siebie siłą, której żaden z nich się nie spodziewa — i żaden z nich nie może mieć nadziei, że się jej oprze.

altTitles.ja: Snow in the Dark 叶 恭弘短編集Ⅲ
スノウ　イン　ザ　ダーク
白雪暗姬

description.en:
Collection of 4 oneshots:  
  
1) MP0   
The oneshot that will lead to Mx0. The names are different but the contents are the same.  
  
2) She Monkey  
A boy has come to a deserted island to meet his scientist father who is working on a top-secret experiment. There he meets a beautiful girl who knows him, but he doesn't know her.  
  
3) Snow in the Dark  
A one-shot fairy tale which shares many elements of the traditional story of Snow White but is certainly unique and complex enough that it is more than just a reinterpretation.  
  
4) Kirino Sako to Nakamatachi (story: Nikohara Daisuke)

title.en: This Monster Wants to Eat Me

altTitles.ja: 私を喰べたい、ひとでなし
Watashi wo Tabetai, Hitodenashi

altTitles.en: A Monster Wants to Eat Me

description.en: High school girl Hinako is living a quiet life in a seaside town, but she feels somewhat detached from her friends during the summer months when she is reminded of when her family died years ago. One day, she meets Shiori, a mysterious girl who reminds her of the ocean, especially when it comes to her translucent blue eyes, but Shiori soon reveals that she is actually a mermaid who has been looking for Hinako for a long time.
description.ru: Старшеклассница Хинако живет обычной жизнью в городке на морском побережье. Однажды она встречает Шиори, загадочную девушку с глазами цвета океана, но вскоре оказывается, что Шиори — на самом деле русалка, которая наблюдала за Хинако уже долгое время.

title.en: Shuu ni Ichido Classmate wo Kau Hanashi ~Futari No Jikan, Iiwake No Gozen'en~

altTitles.ja: 週に一度クラスメイトを買う話～ふたりの時間、言い訳の五千円～

altTitles.en: A Story About Buying a Classmate Once a Week: 5,000 Yen for an Excuse to Spend Time Together

altTitles.ko: 일주일에 한 번 클래스메이트를 사는 이야기 ~두 사람의 시간, 변명의 오천 엔~

description.en: Once a week, Miyagi pays 5,000 yen to her classmate Sendai. The 5,000 yen is to buy three hours of Sendai's time, which gives the right for Miyagi to give her orders. Miyagi is at the bottom of the school caste while Sendai is at the top. The two, who never crossed paths at school, spend time together after school under such a contract. Miyagi's orders are determined by her mood of the day, and Sendai cannot disobey. One day after school... Miyagi calls Sendai to her room and gives her an order that she usually does not give.
description.ja:
クラスメイトの宮城から、週に一度五千円でどんな“命令”でも聞くことになった仙台。陰キャ女子と陽キャ女子、学校では交わらない二人の関係は、密室の部屋の中で少しずつエスカレートしていく…。

『仙台さんの役目は、私の言うことを聞くことだから』

ゲームの相手から宿題の代行…、やがて宮城の肌に仙台の唇が触れて…。
description.es-la: Una vez a la semana, Miyagi paga 5.000 yenes a su compañera de clase Sendai.Los 5.000 yenes son para comprar tres horas de tiempo de Sendai, lo que da derecho a Miyagi a darle órdenes.Miyagi está en la parte baja de la casta escolar mientras que Sendai está en la alta. Las dos, que nunca se han cruzado en la escuela, pasan tiempo juntas después de clase bajo este contrato.Las órdenes de Miyagi vienen determinadas por su estado de ánimo del día, y Sendai no puede desobedecerlas.Un día después de clase... Miyagi llama a Sendai a su habitación y le da una orden que no suele dar.

altTitles.ja: ガチアクタ

description.en:
A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.
___
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alternative Official English: [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (US Only)
description.fa:
در اطـــــــراف حلبی‌آباد  پرتـگاهی وجـو د دارد که هرکـس مرتکب
خلافی شود به آنجا پـــــرت می‌شــود. رودو یتــیمی است که   در 
آنجا زندگی میکند اما روزی  به‌خاطر یک پاپوش او را به اشــــــــد
مجازات محکوم می‌کنند.
description.id:
Di daerah kumuh dimana keturunan kriminal tinggal... orang-orang yang di luar perbatasan mendiskriminasi dan merendahkan mereka sebagai "orang suku.". rudo, anak yatim, yang tinggal di daerah kumuh dengan orang tua angkatnya, regto, dan bertahan hidup menggunakan kemampuan fisik hebatnya. bagaimanapun, suatu hari, dia dituduh melakukan kejahatan yang dia tidak lakukan, dan dilempar ke dalam "abyss" yang bahkan orang-orang di daerah kumu bahkan ditakuti.'
Tinggal di daerah kumuh dari kota makmur, Rudo dan ayah angkatnya regto mencoba untuk bersahabat dengan orang-orang kota, tapi rudo membenci borosnya orang kelas atas. mengabaikan peringatan dari sekitarnya, Rudo mengais sampah melalui tempat pembuangan kota untuk mencari barang-barang bernilai atau berguna untuk diselamatkan dari "abyss"- lubang besar dimana apapun yang dianggap sampah dibuang ke sana, termasuk manusia. Ayah kandung Rudo termasuk orang itu, yang dilempar ke dalalm Abys setelah dia difitnah melakukan pembunuhan.
Suatu hari, setelah lari dari sesosok misterius saat jalan pulang, Rudo menemukan tubuh sekarat Regto terbaring di lantai. dia dengan segera ditemukan di tkp oleh petugas dan dijatuhi dengan pembunuhan. Tidak seorangpun percaya ketidak bersalahannya, dan dia dilempar ke Abyss. Alih-alih mati, dia menemukan dirinya di tempat aneh, dan berbau busuk yang dikelilingi oleh monster yang terbuat dari sampah.
Ketika rudo diserang oleh monster itu, dia diselamatkan oleh pria yang bernama enjin, yang menyebut dirinya sebagai "janitor"- seseorang yang menggunakan senjata spesial yang disebut "jinki" untuk melawan makhluk itu. Agar dapat balas dendam pada orang yang membunuh Regto, Rudo dengan enggan menjadi seorang janitor untuk dapat kembali ke atas dan keluar dari Abyss.
description.ja: 犯罪者の子孫たちが暮らすスラム街。境界線の向こうの人々からは「族民」とさげすまれ、差別を受けていた。孤児だった少年・ルドは、育ての親であるレグトと共にスラム街に住み、常人離れした身体能力を武器に生計を立てていた。だがある日、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、スラムの人々でさえ恐れる「奈落」へと落とされてしまう……。
description.es-la:
Barrios marginales habitados por descendientes de delincuentes. La gente de fuera de la frontera los desprecia y discrimina como "gente de la tribu". Ludo, un niño huérfano, vive en el barrio bajo con su padre adoptivo Legto, y se gana la vida utilizando sus extraordinarias habilidades físicas. Sin embargo, un día es acusado de un crimen que no cometió y se ve abocado al "abismo" que hasta los habitantes de los barrios bajos temen.

(Source: Pocket Magazine)
description.pt-br: O grito redundante da alma que vem do fundo do poço em direção ao mundo infestado pelo desprezo e segregação! O subúrbio onde vivem os descendentes dos criminosos. Mesmo assim o Ludo vivia em meio à esse ambiente, de cabeça erguida, mas......!?

altTitles.th: ก้าวแรกสู่สังเวียน

altTitles.ja: はじめの一歩

description.en:
Makunouchi Ippo is an ordinary high school student in Japan. Since he spends most of his time away from school helping his mother run the family business, he doesn't get to enjoy his younger years like most teenagers. Always a target for bullying at school, Ippo's life is one of hardship. One of these after-school bullying sessions turns Ippo's life around for the better, as he is saved by a boxer named Takamura. He decides to follow in Takamura's footsteps and train to become a boxer, giving his life direction and purpose. Ippo's path to perfecting his pugilistic prowess is just beginning.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Fight!! Ippo** (2006-ongoing)
description.pt-br: Ippo Makunouchi, um tímido estudante de ensino médio, é um dia salvo se der espancado, por Takamura, um boxeador. Encantado pelas habilidade de Takamura e por vídeos de boxe, Ippo decide enfrentar o mundo profissional do boxe!

altTitles.en: TSUYOSHI: The one who no one can win against

altTitles.ja: TSUYOSHI 誰にも勝てない、アイツには

altTitles.ja-ro: TSUYOSHI: Daremo Katenai, Aitsu ni wa

altTitles.th: Tsuyoshi ไอ้หนุ่มหมัดพิฆาตลูกป๋องแป๋ง

description.en: A super-powerful guy keeps defeating everyone around him, even though he doesn't like fighting.

title.en: A Swallow Falling Into the Sea

altTitles.en: ปักษาสู่ห้วงสมุทร

altTitles.ja: 海に堕ちるツバメ
海に墜ちるツバメ

description.en:
Collection of mysterious stories by Chie Shinohara, a great artist of suspense manga.  
  
Story 01 Part 01 & 02: Umi ni Ochiru Tsubame - Swallow Falling into the Sea  
Masako Minase, a scriptwriter, was murdered by Shiki Morimura, her rival in the same profession. Shiki was sure that she had destroyed evidence completely. However, someone who knew the truth appeared, and tried to get Shiki in his power. Is it a mysterious spot or unhappy desire that lurks in her mind?  
  
Story 02: Kioku no Ashioto - The Footsteps of Memory)  
This is the story about Shouko and the almost tragic moment that changed her life and emotions …  
  
Story 03: Shikeidai no 72-jikan - 72 hours of death stand  
Five young people receives a letter saying that they murdered someone and they must go to the address in the letter if they don't want other people to found out. They all find themselves in a old European house, where a crazy lady tells them that one of them is a murderer and if that murderer don't confess in 72 hours, they will all die.

altTitles.ja: チェンソーマン

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

description.en:
"Is this how it feels to have a friend?" 

Bibi is obsessed with Peter, the prince of the school. When she spots Amy next to him, she starts to feel jealous. She invites Amy to her house to warn her, but instead takes a liking to the girl. They agree to be friends on the condition that Amy has to help Bibi confess.
description.fr:
"C'est ce qu'on ressent lorsqu'on a une amie ?"
Bibi est obsédée par Peter, le prince de l'école. Lorsqu'elle repère Amy près de lui, elle commence à être jalouse. Elle invite Amy chez elle pour la prévenir, mais à la place, elle commence à apprécier cette fille. Elles acceptent d'être amies à la condition que Amy doive aider Bibi à se déclarer.
description.ko:
"원래 친구 사이엔 이런 기분이 드는 걸까?"

'비비'는 학교 제일의 킹카 피터에게 집착하다, 그의 곁에 있던 '에이미'를 보고 질투를 느낀다. 그녀에게 경고하기 위해서 자신의 집에 초대했지만 오히려 호감을 느끼게 되고...
둘은 비비의 고백을 돕는다는 조건으로 서로에게 유일한 친구가 되기로 한다.
description.ru:
"Вот что значит быть друзьями?" Биби одержима Питэром, принцем школы.
Когда она замечает Эми рядом с ним, она начинает ревновать. Она приглашает Эми к себе, чтобы предупредить. Но вместо этого Эми нравится ей. Они соглашаются быть друзьями, но при одном условии: Эми должна помочь Биби признаться в любви.

title.en: Kuma to Usagi wa Tomodachi dewa Irarenai

altTitles.ja: クマとウサギは友達ではいられない

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuma to Usagi wa Tomodachi de wa Irarenai

altTitles.en: Bear and Bunny Cannot Be Friends

altTitles.ja: チャラ男くんと清楚ちゃん

description.en:
A playboy goes after an innocent-seeming girl, having no idea what he's getting into.

**Note:** Not to be confused with [NoTR](https://mangadex.org/title/03346265-8076-4b14-8c80-78c2f04511be), another series from this same artist.

Qin NianNian, the SSSSS-level Queen of Mercenaries, became the ruler of the underworld after her death— The Empress of Hell! She is highly intelligent, callous, and cruel in her methods. With her adorable pet, TangYuan, she transmigrates into thousands upon thousands of worlds and switches on her ‘punishing scums’ mode!

title.en: The Ugly Wife of the Shady Duke

description.en: Reincarnated as the neglected wife of a duke who secretly loves the novel's heroine, she plans to divorce him to survive. Yet, he desperately begs her not to leave, confusing her as the story unfolds differently than she remembered.

title.en: More Than Lovers, Less Than Friends

altTitles.ja: 恋人以上友人未満

altTitles.en: More Than Lovers, Less Than Friends

altTitles.pt-br: Mais Que Amantes, Menos Que Amigos

altTitles.ru: Больше чем любовники, меньше чем друзья

description.en: Ex-AV star Miyako unexpectedly runs into a former coworker at a marriage interview...?! The secretly connected pair are bursting with more pure energy than you can imagine! This cute adult love comedy hits different and will heal your soul.
description.ja: 東京から地元へ戻った宮子のお見合い相手は互いの秘密を握る元お仕事相手だった！　清楚な文学少女を演じていた元AV女優とオラオラ系男を演じていた元AV男優が素の自分に戻って再会した時、この上もなくピュアなラブが始まる…！カラダは恋人以上、ココロは友人未満!?
description.ru: Мияко, уволившаяся с работы и вернувшаяся в родительский дом, затеяла сватовство. Однако второй стороной оказался бывший коллега, знавший разные секреты.
description.pt-br:
A ex-estrela de AV(Adult Videos) Miyako inesperadamente encontra um ex-colega de trabalho em uma entrevista de casamento...?! O par secretamente conectado está repleto de energia mais pura do que você pode imaginar! 

Esta comédia de amor adulto é diferente e vai curar sua alma.

altTitles.ja: マリッジトキシン

description.en:
A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…

------
- [Official English Volumes at Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/marriage-toxin)
description.ja: <毎週水曜更新>殺し屋×結婚詐欺師の世界一ハードな婚活バトル物語！数百年続く殺し屋一族の青年・下呂。学校にも行かず裏稼業で生きてきた彼にとって女性は「苦手で縁遠いもの」であり、結婚は「するべきではないもの」と考えていた。だがある日、血が絶えることを恐れた彼の実家は、下呂が結婚し子供を残さないならば、妹に「それ」を強制することを通告。困り果てた下呂は仕事のターゲットであった結婚詐欺師に…。
description.pt-br:
Um assassino de aluguel e uma vigarista de casamentos partem na batalha mais cansativa do mundo! 

Gero é um jovem de um clã de assassinos, que existe há centenas de anos. Como alguém que nunca foi à escola e viveu sua vida lidando com o lado sombrio do negócio, ele se considera “sem perspectivas com mulheres” e o casamento é “algo que não é para ele”. No entanto, um dia, com medo de que sua linhagem se dissolva, seu clã avisa Gero que, se ele não se casar e ter um herdeiro, eles não terão escolha a não ser… forçar sua irmãzinha a fazer “isso”. Levado ao extremo, Gero pede ao alvo de seu trabalho, uma vigarista de casamento, para que...

altTitles.en: Creepy Cat ~ My Strange Daily Life with a Cat ~

altTitles.ja: CreepyCat 猫と私の奇妙な生活

altTitles.ms: Kucing Seram - Kehidupan seharian yang pelik bersama kucing.

altTitles.uk: Моторошний кіт - Моє дивне життя з котиком

altTitles.ro: Pisica Ciudată - Viața Mea Zilnică cu o Pisică Ciudată

altTitles.ur: ترسناک بلی ~ بساتھ ایک بلی میری عجیب زندگیِ روزمرہ ~

description.en:
Flora moves into a mysterious mansion and finds it inhabited by a strange creature—Creepy Cat!
Thus begins her strange and sometimes dangerous life with a feline roommate.
This Gothic comedy brings the chuckles…and the chills!

Source: Seven Seas Entertainment
description.uk: Флора тільки-но переїхала до старого будинку, але тут вже живе моторошний котик. Відтоді й почалось їхнє таємниче співіснування.
description.ur: فلورا ابھی ایک پرانے گھر میں منتقل ہوئی ہے، لیکن وہاں پہلے ہی ایک ترسناک بلی رہ رہی ہے۔ تب سے ان کی پراسرار ہم آہنگی کا آغاز ہوا۔

title.en: E, Shanai System Subete Wan'ope shiteiru Watashi wo Kaiko desu ka?

altTitles.ja: え、社内システム全てワンオペしている私を解雇ですか？

altTitles.ja-ro: E, Shanai System Subete OneOpe shiteiru Watashi o Kaiko Desu ka?

altTitles.en: Eh, Are You Seriously Going to Fire Me When I’ve Been Handling the Company’s In-House System as a One-Man Show?

description.en: Satou Ai who has been handling the company's in-house system as a one-man show, has received a notice of dismissal upon a change in president. After the dismissal, Ai was alone in deep sorrows until she stumbled upon Suzuki Kenta. Kenta invites her to join his startup company. The company was something he started to get close to others with the name, "True programmer's cram school" with Ai's unconventional, daring and sometimes wild lectures, the student started to look forward to the lessons.
description.ja: 社内システムをワンオペしていた佐藤愛は、社長交代を機に解雇予告を受ける。退職後、ファミレスでひとり悲しみに暮れていた愛は、幼馴染の鈴木健太と再会する。そして健太は彼女を自らのスタートアップに招待した。相手の心に寄り添うために始めた事業、その名は「真のプログラマ塾」。佐藤愛の熱く、時に破天荒な講義で受講生たちは少しだけ前を向く。

title.en: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Kitan - Jack the Ripper no Jikenbo

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ奇譚 ジャック・ザ・リッパーの事件簿

altTitles.en: The Jack the Ripper Case Files
Record of Ragnarok: The Jack the Ripper Case Files

altTitles.ru: Повесть о Конце Света: Досье Джека-потрошителя

altTitles.en: Record of Ragnarok Curious Tale: The Jack the Ripper Case Files

description.en:
In 1888, a number of prostitutes were murdered in London, by someone known only as "Jack the Ripper". The murderer takes to the streets each day, looking to slit some unfortunate woman open... The past of Jack the Ripper, the English gentleman who represented the human side in the fourth round of the struggle between God and mankind known as Ragnarok, who was one of the top-three most popular characters in the character poll, is finally revealed!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/z_R0212)
description.ja: 『終末のワルキューレ』第4回戦人類代表ジャック・ザ・リッパー。霧の都ロンドンを、恐怖のどん底に落とし、人類が応援することさえ躊躇した狂喜の殺人紳士に隠された真実とは？

title.en: Welcome to the Cheap Restaurant of Outcasts!

altTitles.ja: 追放者食堂へようこそ！ ～最強パーティーを追放された料理人（Lv.99）は、田舎で念願の冒険者食堂を開きます！～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihousha Shokudou e Youkoso! ~Saikyou Party o Tsuihou Sareta Ryourinin (Lv.99) wa, Inaka de Nengan no Boukensha Shokudou o Hirakimasu!~

altTitles.ko: 추방자 식당에 어서 오세요! ~최강 파티에서 추방당한 요리사는 모험자 식당을 개업합니다!~

altTitles.ko-ro: Chubangja sigdang-e eoseo oseyo! ~choegang patieseo chubangdanghan yolisaneun moheomja sigdang-eul gaeeobhabnida!~

altTitles.vi: Chào mừng đến với nhà hàng của những kẻ bị ruồng bỏ

description.en: After getting kicked out of the strongest party, the level 99 chef fulfills his dream of opening an adventurer diner in the countryside.
description.ja: 最強ギルドを追放された料理人・デニス。彼は奴隷少女のアトリエとともに『冒険者食堂』を開店させるのだった。至高の料理スキルを活かした庶民的で温かいデニスの料理は、ちょっとアレな冒険者たちの心と身体を癒やしていくが……。

title.en: Maou Gun Saikyou no Majutsushi wa Ningen datta

altTitles.en: The Maou Army's Strongest Magician Was a Human

altTitles.ru: Самый сильный волшебник армии Мао оказался человеком

altTitles.ja: 魔王軍最強の魔術師は人間だった

altTitles.zh-hk: 魔王軍最強的魔術師是人類

altTitles.en: The Strongest Magician in the Demon Lord's Army Was a Human

description.en: “Maou Army’s strongest magician” I’m called. Ike, a demon capable of capturing a fort alone. Clearing away enemies with immense magic, he is without a doubt a monster held in awe by friend and foe. However he has a secret he can’t tell other demons. “I, actually am a human you know.” Using modern knowledge to keep his secret, he became treated as a great commander and the driving force of the Maou’s army.

title.en: Yuusha to Yobareta Nochi ni - Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru

altTitles.ja: 勇者と呼ばれた後に ―そして無双男は家族を創る―

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha to Yobareta Ato ni - Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru

altTitles.en: After Being Called a Hero: The Unrivaled Man Starts a Family

description.en: In a world where humans and demons clash, the one who decimated the Demon Lord's army was a lone hero named Lloyd. Possessing power so immense that he was said by the Demon Lord to be near godlike, after the war, Lloyd was appointed by the king to be the lord of a remote territory and was sent far away. Furthermore, he was tasked with subduing the Emperor Dragon residing in that land, which he quickly defeated. However, the defeated dragon transformed into a beautiful woman and chose to become Lloyd's companion!?
description.ja: 人間と魔族が争う世界――魔王軍を壊滅させたのはたったひとりの勇者、ロイドという男だった。魔王から神に近いとまで言われた力を持つロイドは戦後、王により辺境の領主を命じられ、遠ざけられた。さらにその地に棲む皇帝竜の討伐も頼まれたが、早々に倒してしまう。しかし敗れた竜は、美しい女性に変化し、ロイドの伴侶になることに!?これは最強と呼ばれながらも自分自身の価値を見つけられなかった男が「家族」を見つける物語。

altTitles.ja: ボーナスの季節

description.en:
**Link:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/72393492) (Page 11 only, Artist compiled it with their other work and illustrations)

altTitles.ja: 太后の男たち

altTitles.zh: 太后裙下臣（暴君重生成男宠）

description.en: The tyrant Xi Wuji always thought that his pampered queen treated him affectionately, like a delicate little lotus flower. He thought she loved him, but on the day of his death, he opened his eyes. As a result of his death, she took charge of the government and had many lovers, and lived in debauchery. But he became her favourite lover again in this new life‽

altTitles.ja: 忠犬
マグナVSブラピ

description.en:
**Link:**
- Official Raw (Chapter 2) - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/74190351)

title.en: Ayame-senpai wa Boku to Himitsu no Keiyaku wo

altTitles.ja-ro: Ayame Senpai to Boku ha Himitsu no Keiyaku wo

altTitles.en: Ayame-senpai Made a Secret Contract with Me.

altTitles.ja: あやめ先輩は僕とヒミツの契約を

altTitles.zh: 绫目学姐与我订下的秘密契约

altTitles.zh-ro: Líng mù xué jiě yǔ wǒ dìng xià de mìmì qìyuē

description.en:
On his way home from school, Mitsuya Daiki - an ordinary high school student - finds a girl covered in wounds. Upon closer look, he finds that the girl has animal ears, but she licks Daiki's ears and leaves. Daiki begins to wonder if it was just a dream, when Sakuragami Ayame appears upon him…? After telling her of the ability of Daiki's ears, Ayame feels responsible for dragging him into this, and proposes an oath of absolute servitude to protect him at all costs!   
- [Alternative Raw](http://www.takeshobo.co.jp/book_d/shohin/2820601)
description.ja:
ごく普通の高校生・三ツ矢大樹は、学校帰りに傷だらけの女の子を見つける。
よくみると動物の耳が生えている彼女は、大樹の耳を舐めると、立ち去っていった。
夢だったんじゃないか、と考え始めた大樹のもとに、桜神あやめが現れて――!?

大樹の耳が持つ力を伝えたあやめは、彼を巻き込んだ責任を感じ、なんとしても守るべく絶対従属の誓いを提案するのだった。
description.pt-br: A caminho de casa da escola, Mitsuya Daikiーum estudante comum do ensino médio encontra uma garota coberta de feridas. Ao olhar mais de perto, ele descobre que a garota tem orelhas de animais, mas ela lambe as orelhas de Daiki e sai. Daiki começa a se perguntar se foi apenas um sonho, quando Sakuragami Ayame aparece sobre ele…? Depois de contar a ela sobre a capacidade dos ouvidos de Daiki, Ayame se sente responsável por arrastá-lo para isso e propõe um juramento de servidão absoluta para protegê-lo a todo custo!

title.en: I Bought A Rude Elf Slave At The Market

altTitles.ja: 市場で買った奴隷エルフにオラつかれる

altTitles.ja-ro: Ichiba de katta dorei Erufu ni ora tsukareru

title.en: Wazawai no Avalon ~Game Saijaku no Akuyaku Debu ni Ten'i Shita kedo, Ore dake "Yasereba Tsuyokute New Game" na Sekai datta no de, Saisoku Level Up & Hametsu Flag Kaihi de Kage no Eiyuu o Mezashimasu~

altTitles.ja: 災悪のアヴァロン～ゲーム最弱の悪役デブに転移したけど、俺だけ“やせれば強くてニューゲーム”な世界だったので、最速レベルアップ＆破滅フラグ回避で影の英雄を目指します～

altTitles.en: Finding Avalon: The Quest of a Chaosbringer

description.en:
The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dungeon Explorer Chronicle (Dun-Ex). During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it.
In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server. Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!
description.ja: 廃人ゲーマーの会社員“俺”は、やり込んだVRMMO「ダンエク」の世界に転移した。しかし転移先は悪役のデブキャラで!?

title.en: Kuuzoku Huck to Jouki no Hime

altTitles.ja: 空賊ハックと蒸気の姫

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuuzoku Hakku to Jouki no Hime

altTitles.en: Huck the Air Pirate and the Princess of Steam

description.en:
1901 - The Mist Industrial Revolution ushered in the "Age of the Air."

As people move their lives from the ground to the skies, "air pirates" appear, forming cliques and roaming the skies. 
Among them there was a pirate who disliked herds and roamed the skies freely, and his name was Huck.

---
**Link:**

* [Mag-Garden](https://www.mag-garden.co.jp/comics/13202/)
description.ja:
空に浮かぶ島々、世界を揺るがす秘宝、謎めく少女との出会い、飛びきりの浪漫がここに。
帝王暦1901年、浮遊性蒸気（ミスト）の発見により人々は地上から空に生活の場を移していた。一攫千金を夢見る青年ハックはまだ見ぬ宝と浪漫を追い求めるあまり万年金欠…底辺の空賊と呼ばれていた。そんなある日、人狼に追われる一人の少女と出会う。それが空の時代を揺るがす大事件に繋がるとも知らず…。かつて子どもだった大人達へおくるネオ・ジュブナイル冒険活劇、開幕!!

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

title.en: Sekai Saikyou no Kouei: Meikyuukoku no Shinjin Tansakusha

altTitles.fr: L'arrière-garde la plus forte du monde - L'explorateur novice du pays du labyrinthe

altTitles.en: World Strongest Rearguard: Labyrinth Country and Dungeon Seekers
World's Strongest Rearguard - The Novice Seeker of Labyrinth Country

altTitles.ru: Самый сильный в мире Заступник – Страна лабиринта и искатели приключений

altTitles.ja: 世界最強の後衛
世界最強の後衛 ～迷宮国の新人探索者～

altTitles.zh-hk: 世界最強後衛～迷宮國的新人探索者～

altTitles.en: The World's Strongest Rearguard: Labyrinth Country's Novice Seeker

altTitles.zh: 世界最强后卫~迷宫国的新人探索者~

description.en:
Workaholic assistant Atobe Arihito fell asleep in his company's bus that was traveling for a vacation. When he awoke he learned he had died due to the bus getting into an accident, and that he had reincarnated into a world of reincarnators - to the Labyrinth Country. To his surprise he was discovered by his slave driving manager, Igarashi Kyouka, who further explains their role in this world. 


In Labyrinth Country, Reincarnators are expected to choose a job and form parties to fight against monsters in Labyrinths. "Valkyrie" Kyouka had expected Arihito to work with her once again, but he declines due to his knowledge of her demanding nature. As they depart she vows to make him regret not choosing her. 

And thus starts Arihito's adventure as a "Rear Guard".
description.ru:
Главный герой — трудоголик с большим стажем, он и его босс попадают в аварию, после чего они обнаруживают, что переместились в другой мир. Главный герой не хочет оставаться с начальницей, решая отправиться на приключения в одиночестве. Куда же его приведут эти странствия и встретятся ли они вновь?..   


---

**Links:** [Alternate Raw](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF00000068010000_68/)

altTitles.ja: ラディアン

description.en:
Seth is an apprentice sorcerer from the Pompo Hills. Like all sorcerers, he's an "infected", one of the few people having survived an encounter with a Nemesis, those creatures falling from the sky and destroying everything around them. Being immune to them, Seth wants to become a Hunter and fight the Nemesis. But what Seth really wants is to find the source of all Nemesis, the Radiant. Helped by his fellow sorcerers, he will seek the Radiant, under the harsh scrutiny of the Inquisition…


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2021)
description.fr:
Seth est un aspirant sorcier de la région des Pompo Hills. Comme tous les sorciers, c'est un " infecté " : un des rares êtres vivants ayant survécu au contact des Némésis, ces créatures tombées du ciel qui contaminent et déciment tous ceux qu'elles touchent. Son apparente immunité lui a fait choisir une voie qui lui semblait toute désignée : devenir Chasseur et combattre les Némésis.  
  
Mais plus que ça, Seth souhaite s'engager dans une quête qui dépasse la simple chasse aux monstres… Entouré d'une faction de sorciers, il parcourt le monde à la recherche du Radiant, le berceau présumé des monstres, sous l'oeil terrible de l'Inquisition…  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/nep_radiant)  
- [Mangaka’s Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tonytonyvalente/)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](https://www6.nhk.or.jp/anime/program/detail.html?i=radiant)  
- [Official Page (JP)](http://www.euromanga.jp/category/title/radiant/)
description.ru: В мире, где на землю снизошёл гнев небес и появились мстители, человечество пытается из последних сил выжить… Как бы противно и страшно людям не было, но они вынуждены сотрудничать с существами, не менее опасными и ужасающими, чем пришельцы… С проклятыми изгоями общества, с колдунами! Сет – молодой, энергичный ученик колдуна, бравый парень, пытающийся под началом своего учителя уничтожить своего первого мстителя… Волей судьбы он находит его… или их… ДА ТУТ ЦЕЛОЕ СТАДО!!! Вперед, Сет! Вжарь им!
description.pt-br: Seth é um aprendiz de feiticeiro das colinas de Pompo. Como todos os feiticeiros, ele é um "infectado", uma das poucas pessoas que sobreviveram a um encontro com um Nêmesis, criaturas que caem do céu e destroem tudo ao seu redor. Sendo imune a eles, Seth quer se tornar um caçador e lutar contra os Nêmesis. Mas o que Seth realmente quer é encontrar a fonte dos Nemesis, o Radiant. Ajudado por seus companheiros feiticeiros, ele buscará o Radiant, sob a rigorosa caça da Inquisição contra os feiticeiros.

altTitles.es-la: La Espada de la Inquisición Celestial

description.en:
“He is the master of the Nine Heavens.”

Yeon Jeokha was the child of a second wife. Viciously bullied by his father’s first wife and his siblings, he was later imprisoned in a warehouse after his father died of illness…

It has been ten years since his escape after he had learned martial arts that were out of the world.

“I regard the Yeon Family with great bitterness.”

The unstoppable adventure of the sole successor of the Heavenly Inquisition Sword, Yeon Jeokha, begins now!

altTitles.en: I Will Live as an Actor

altTitles.ja: 役者として生きる

description.en: To escape a life of poverty, Jang Youngkuk aspired to be a famous actor. And he succeeds... at the cost of his mother's life. Upon proceeding to take his own out of despair, Youngkuk miraculously returns to his childhood. With a second chance to make things right, he swears to abandon acting and be the good son he never was. However, when financial troubles begin to haunt Youngkuk and his mother, he discovers that he may have no choice but to return to the set for one last take.

title.en: Jimoto no Ijimekko-tachi ni Shikaeshi Shiyou to Shitara, Betsu no Tatakai ga Hajimatta.

altTitles.ja: 地元のいじめっ子達に仕返ししようとしたら、別の戦いが始まった。

altTitles.en: When Trying to Get Back at the Hometown Bullies, Another Battle Began.

altTitles.zh: 本想报复以前欺负我的孩子王，另一场战斗却开始了。

description.en: Local bullies tormented Kotaro when he was a youngster. They were the skilled wrestler Akari, a skilled basketball prodigy Kanae, and Shigure, a prodigy in video games. Every day, Kotaro competed against these three guys in their respective sports with the intention of winning. Unfortunately, he was no match for them. As a senior in high school, Kotaro now has another opportunity to confront them and exact his retribution...! But he will discover a secret that he never would have expected...
description.ja: 子供のころ、小太郎は地元のいじめっ子によって屈辱の日々を送っていた。レスリングの天才少年・アキラ、バスケの天才少年・カナエ、天才ゲーマー少年・シグレにあらゆる勝負で負け続けていたのだった高校生となった小太郎は、仕返しするべく３人と再会したのであったが…！？
description.vi: Oneshot chính thức được làm thành series của tác giả Matsumoto Kengo. Sau nhiều năm rời xa quê hương, Kotaro đã quay về để báo thù 3 kẻ bắt nạt từng khiến cậu khổ sở hồi cấp 1. Thế nhưng khi gặp lại 3 kẻ bắt nạt, những gì chờ đợt cậu lại vượt xa những gì cậu tưởng tượng...
description.pt-br: Os valentões locais atormentaram Kotaro quando ele era jovem. Eles eram o lutador habilidoso Akari. Kanae, um prodígio do basquete, e Shigure, um prodígio dos videogames. Todos os dias, Kotaro competia contra esses três caras em seus respectivos esportes com a intenção de vencer. Infelizmente, ele não era páreo para eles. No último ano do ensino médio, Kotaro agora tem outra oportunidade de enfrentá-los e exigir sua retribuição…! Mas ele descobrirá um segredo que nunca teria esperado…

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

altTitles.pl: Anioł z sąsiedztwa niezwykle mnie rozpieszcza

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.pl: Mahiru jest piękną dziewczyną, którą koledzy z klasy nazywają "aniołkiem". Jest nie tylko świetnie wysportowana i ma doskonałe oceny - jest także zabójczo piękna. Amane, przeciętny facet i samozwańczy niechluj, nigdy nie myślał zbyt wiele o tej boskiej piękności, mimo że uczęszczał do tej samej szkoły. Wszystko zmienia się jednak, gdy widzi Mahiru siedzącą samotnie w parku podczas ulewy. Tak zaczyna się dziwna relacja między tą nieprawdopodobną parą!
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

altTitles.ja: WORST外伝 ゼットン先生

description.en: After years of studying, Hanazawa Saburou, AKA Suzuran's legendary Zetton, has finally become a high school teacher. But on his first day at work, the principal tells him he was actually hired not to teach, but to make the students of his homeroom class drop out of school?!
description.ru: После долгих лет учёбы Сабуро Ханадзава, также известный как легендарный Зеттон Судзурана, наконец-то стал учителем средней школы. Но в первый же день на работе директор рассказал ему, что на самом деле его наняли не для того, чтобы преподавать, а для того, чтобы заставить учеников вверенного ему класса бросить школу!
